com.bws.jdistil.core.conversion
Class BooleanConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.bws.jdistil.core.conversion.BooleanConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConverter
public class BooleanConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConverter

Class used to format and parse boolean objects. Implementation does not support locale specific formats.

Author:
- Bryan Snipes

Method Summary
